special_text:
[i]Unreal[/i] – You may activate an additional loyalty ability of this planeswalker if a permanent phased in or was created under your control this turn.
[+1]: Draw a card. Create a Map token if you've drawn three or more cards this turn. [i](It has “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
[-5]: Exile another target permanent. Create a token that's a copy of that permanent, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.
